name: BancBoston Capital
overview: BancBoston Capital, Inc. is out of business. BancBoston Capital, Inc. formerly operated as a subsidiary of BancBoston Investments Inc. The Company was formerly known as First Venture Capital Corporation of Boston. It is a principal investment firm specializing in direct and fund of fund investments. The firm is a licensed Small Business Investment Company (SBIC). It prefers to invest in early stage, later-stage capital options, including equity, co-investment, mezzanine capital, buyouts, recapitalizations, and expansion of mid-sized companies. Additionally, the firm participates in secondary purchases of limited partnerships from other fund portfolios and in investments in middle market com…
